column5: For those who have Rogers Digital Cable and dont have the WFN - World Fishing Network Chan.  Rogers has a promo right now.. sign up and get 2 months free!  So, you can get it (If you dont have it) and if after 2months you dont want it or dont want to pay the $2.50 p/month for the 1 station you can cancel while enjoying it for 2 months for free.  Its actually on for free right now (today is the last day)
